description: Super Mario Odyssey is a 3-D Platformer where Mario sets off across the world with his companion Cappy to save Princess Peach and Cappy's sister Tiara from Bowser's wedding plans.

v1.1.description:
MOD
- Added support for shop items
- Balanced coin prices
- Outfits automatically equip when received
- Made regional coins threshold based (getting all regional shop items requires all regional coins) and prevents softlocks from purchasing the wrong item
- Added gifted outfits (i.e. Captain, King, Invisibility)

SERVER
- Added more gift moons to be held by the server, so the in-game check doesn't become inaccessible
- Server logs when an outfit, sticker, or souvenir is collected

APWORLD
- Fixed softlock in Bowser's Kingdom
- Fixed logic for required moons to reach A Traditional Festival
- Added outfit subarea requirements
- Added logic for post game outfits based on moon requirements
- Added shop item locations
- Fixed moon counting to prevent misplaced items
- Added Options: win condition and shopsanity
- Tweaked item placement rules

## What's Changed
* Add support for shop items by @Kgamer77 in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/1

## New Contributors
* @Kgamer77 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/compare/v1.0...v1.1
v1.1.title: SMO Ap v1.1

v1.1.1.description:
SERVER
- Fixed error where costumes wouldn't be sent

MOD
- Fixed error causing outfits to not equip and items not being added to the inventory/closet

## What's Changed
* Hotfix 1.1.1 by @Kgamer77 in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/2


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/compare/v1.1...v1.1.1
v1.1.1.title: SMO Ap v1.1.1

v1.2.description:
## Mod
- Fixed Hint Art Moons not sending checks
- Fixed Softlock in Ruined Kingdom and Lost Kingdom when not having enough moons to leave preventing backtracking

## Server
- Made checking for goal state and sending goal state expandable to reflect logic options
- Fixed the successful connection message from always appearing even when connection to AP fails
- Can now change slot and password using the `reconnect` command `reconnect <slot>` or  `reconnect <slot> <password>` and still maintains original functionality without arguments

## AP World
- Added to repo
- Numerous logic changes and fixes
- Added filler Coin items with various coin amounts
- All Supported Goal types are working

## Files
- Version of the mod files for emulator

## What's Changed
* Fix Lost and Ruined Softlocks by @Kgamer77 in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/3
* Server tweaks by @Kgamer77 in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/4
* Hint Art Moon Fix by @Kgamer77 in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/5
* Bug Fix 3 by @Kgamer77 in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/6


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/compare/v1.1.1...v1.2
v1.2.title: SMO Archipelago v1.2

v1.3.description:
## Mod
- Added support for displaying Archipelago lobby messages in game.
- This includes items sent and received by the game's connected slot as well as relevant hints 

## Server
- Backend changes to allow for Archipelago lobby messages to be sent to the game.
- Small moon list changes

## World
- Fixed unneeded import causing world generation to fail
- changed how some items are placed for code readability and ease of editing long term
- Fixed issues that led to large amount of unplaced items.
- Fixed issues regarding accessibility checks revolving around outfit moons.


## What's Changed
* Add ap chat display in game by @Kgamer77 in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/7


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/compare/v1.2...v1.3
v1.3.title: v1.3

v1.4.description:
## Server
- Added `apsync` command for forcibly resyncing missing checks with the AP room. A moon that appears uncollected must be grabbed to ensure the sync works completely.
- Added a storage for locations obtained before connecting to the AP room for smooth play
- Added `connect` command for changing the AP room address and port. `connect <address:port>`, `connect <address> <port>`, `connect <address> <port> <slot>`

## World
- Fixed All Logic before postgame
- Added option for enabling/disabling Story Moon and Multi-Moon randomization

## What's Changed
* 1.4 by @Kgamer77 in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/8


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/compare/v1.3...v1.4
v1.4.title: v1.4

v1.5.description:
## Mod
- Fixed Multi-moons crashing when grabbed in a kingdom that hasn't been unlocked yet. Now sends player to last unlocked kingdom
- Slight change to allow regional coins to work while randomization feature is still WIP
- Added DeathLink support
- Fixed already collected multi-moons crashing the game
- Added going to a kingdom that hasn't been unlock syncs scenario depending on what multi-moon locations have been checked
- Fixed Multi-Moon locations not sending

## Server
- Removed

## World
- Removed romfs option
- Added romfs option to host.py for patching (This is similar to other games that require a rom to apply patches to except just the folder directory)
- Changed item names to correspond with in-game names.
- Added Super Mario Odyssey Client that can be opened via Archipelago Launcher
- Client now handles all game connection obsoleting Server.
- Now generates `.apsmo` patch file that can be applied using `Open Patch` in the Archipelago Launcher
- `.apsmo` file only generated when an option requiring patching is enabled.
- SMO Client now stores checks and sends then to the AP lobby after successful login.
- Slight change to allow regional coins to work while randomization feature is still WIP
- `Sync` command added to SMO Client for force syncing inventory with AP lobby.
- Item syncing made more robust
- Fixed shop item checks not working properly due to error in packet structure.
- Added DeathLink support
- Added `/warp` command for debugging and softlock prevention
- Changed how directories are handled to fix issues on Linux #22 
- Fixed most client instability hopefully.
- Fixed patching issues caused by changes in AP 0.6.2
- Fixed crash caused by progress packet being handled improperly

## What's Changed
* Fix broken map edits by @MarioManTAW in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/15
* Fix shop item names by @MarioManTAW in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/16
* Fix Dark Side Multi-Moon by @MarioManTAW in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/17
* Fix shop item patching by @MarioManTAW in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/18
* Kgamer77 1.5 readme by @Kgamer77 in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/20
* Fix patching issues by @MarioManTAW in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/21
* 1.5 by @Kgamer77 in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/23

## New Contributors
* @MarioManTAW made their first contribution in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/15

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/compare/v1.4...v1.5
v1.5.title: v1.5 Hotfix 2

v1.5-beta.description:
## Mod
- Added NPC behavior changes to allow NPCs to give you their moons repeatedly to prevent soft locks and remove the dependency on the server connector that sometimes required starting from a new file after soft locking or soft lock looping infinitely due to these moons not syncing correctly
- Added pipes that connect branching worlds (Lake and Wooded, Seaside and Snow)
- Added pipe connecting Bowser to Luncheon to allow backtracking and prevent soft locks when not having all Bowser story moons to progress

## Server
- Server now handles distributing moon when received from the lobby instead of the lobby passing it by id

## World
- Completely new logic
- Fixed duplicate goal placements when Story/Multi moon randomization is disabled
- Added moon count randomization which randomizes the number of moons needed to upgrade the Odyssey in a kingdom
- Added moon color randomization which randomizes the colors of power moons in all kingdoms except Mushroom.
- Added text patch to patch shop item names to be the name of the AP item at the location.
- Added romFS option to the settings. This is where you put the path to the contents of the mod romfs folder for applying game patches.
- Output generates a zip folder containing the patch data.
- Now supports Archipelago 0.6.1
- Fixed MSBT serializer
- Fixed logic allowing for multiple SMO instances in a single multiworld

# Warning: This is a beta build and has not been tested fully, bugs are likely.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/compare/v1.4...v1.5-beta
v1.5-beta.title: v1.5-beta

v1.5.1-beta.description:
## Mod
- Fixed Multi-moons crashing when grabbed in a kingdom that hasn't been unlocked yet. Now sends player to Sand
- Slight change to allow regional coins to work while randomization feature is still WIP

## Server
- Removed
- Slight change to allow regional coins to work while randomization feature is still WIP
## World
- Removed romfs option
- Added romfs option to host.py for patching (This is similar to other games that require a rom to apply patches to except just the folder directory)
- Changed item names to correspond with in-game names.
- Added Super Mario Odyssey Client that can be opened via Archipelago Launcher
- Client now handles all game connection obsoleting Server.
- Now generates `.apsmo` patch file that can be applied using `Open Patch` in the Archipelago Launcher
- `.apsmo` file only generated when an option requiring patching is enabled.
- SMO Client now stores checks and sends then to the AP lobby after successful login.
- Slight change to allow regional coins to work while randomization feature is still WIP
- `Sync` command added to SMO Client for force syncing inventory with AP lobby.
- Item syncing made more robust
- Fixed shop item checks not working properly due to error in packet structure.

## What's Changed
* Fix broken map edits by @MarioManTAW in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/15
* Fix shop item names by @MarioManTAW in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/16
* Fix Dark Side Multi-Moon by @MarioManTAW in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/17
* Fix shop item patching by @MarioManTAW in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/18
* Kgamer77 Removed Server, added connector to apworld
* Kgamer77 1.5 readme by @Kgamer77 in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/20

## New Contributors
* @MarioManTAW made their first contribution in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/15

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/compare/v1.5-beta...v1.5.1-beta
v1.5.1-beta.title: v1.5.1-beta

v1.6.description:
## Mod
- Scenario system improved, kingdoms should no longer reset
- Moon list now tracks which moon locations have been sent
- Capture Sanity added (check usable captures in the Capture list)
- Check system overhauled and unified into one packet
- Fixed some Power Moon tracking issues
- Moons now become clear when their location is collected not when their item is received
- Receiving Coins works again
- Outfits should now only auto equip when first received not on additional reconnects to the client
- No longer requires romfs patches for different seeds
- Numerous soft locks addressed
- Numerous crashes fixed
- Decoupled story progress from moon list
- Moons now display the name of the item at the location when grabbed instead of "/////////"
- Added check index tracking

## World
- Logic has been overhauled
- Story moons and Multi moons should no longer be required in inventory to progress kingdoms
- Capture Sanity added (current full logic up to moon kingdom)
- Colors option revamped (Progression based color options coming soon)
- Extra Moons option added to tweak how many additional moons you want in the pool
- Client stability improved
- Revamped filler, now only one Coin item with support for multiple values
- Automatically syncs game patch data obsoleting .apsmo patch
- Region Errors fixed
- Fixed Lost Kingdom Capture Sanity logic
- Removed bloat


## What's Changed
* 1.5 hotfix 1 by @Kgamer77 in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/24
* 1.5 by @Kgamer77 in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/25
* Github Desktop error by @Kgamer77 in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/44
* 1.5 by @Kgamer77 in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/45
* 1.6 by @Kgamer77 in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/46


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/compare/v1.5...v1.6
v1.6.title: v1.6.2 Hotfix

v1.6.3r2.description:
## Mod
- Fixed some issues with chat window drawing
- Fixed ShineColors being unsigned instead of signed
- Fixed CheckIndex inconsistency between sessions of the same seed

## World
- Fixed Night Sand logic containing impossible moons
- Fixed Broode's Chain Chomp being able to have an item on it required to reach the location.
- Fixed some color inconsistencies
- Slight Client changes
- Fixed Counts for Wooded and Lake being swapped during placement

## What's Changed
* 1.6.2 Hot Fix by @Kgamer77 in https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/pull/47


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Kgamer77/SuperMarioOdysseyArchipelago/compare/v1.6...v1.6.3
v1.6.3r2.title: v1.6.3 Hot Fix
